id.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

name.description: The name of the Alibaba Cloud account to be used in Cloud Account Management.

description.description:
The description of the Alibaba Cloud account.
The default value is an empty string if the field is omitted.

If-Match.description: Entity tag in MD5 format to perform version control on the resource to be updated. This is returned in response header `ETag` of the v3 GET method.
